Salesforce IdeasThe IdeaExchange was designed so that we would have the opportunity to share what we, as the end users of Salesforce, the people that use it everyday, want and need as features and functionality.It’s awesome. It’s one of the most amazing, dare I even say revolutionary opportunities that we have.So, we should be taking advantage of it, by posting and voting for Salesforce Ideas This page displays the posts I’ve witten about Ideas that are important to me and that I think deserve some recognition.Click around and take a look.

Salesforce Ideas

Login Flow Deployment

Update for Login Flow Deployments with Spring 21 and their new availability in the metadata API making them deployable! March 23, 2021 AwesomeAdmin,Ideas,Lightning,Salesforce automation,Change set,Delivered Ideas,Deployment,flow,Login Flow,Metadata API,visual flow Read More

Lightning Ideas Delivered

Know what I like about Salesforce? Well, one thing I really like…. The fact that they listen, seriously.  Are you using the IdeaExchange?  If not, you need to stop reading now, and go … September 13, 2016 AwesomeAdmin,Ideas,Lightning,Ohana,Salesforce flow,home page,thank you,usability,vote Read More

Features You Need To Contact Salesforce For

Ever wonder what features you need to contact Salesforce to activate or deactivate?Check out the community doc and submit other features you have learned require Salesforce Support. September 9, 2016 Communities,Ideas,Ohana,Salesforce activate,basics,beginner admin,deactivate,salesforce support Read More

Custom Lightning Layouts & Usability Ideas

Salesforce’s Lightning Experience is beautiful.There are a few ideas out there to make it even better.Learn about page layouts and a few of the top ideas to vote for regarding them in this post. March 2, 2016 Ideas,Lightning,Salesforce custom fields,features,functionality,Help Text,home page,layout,profile Read More

Lightning Recycling Bin

Add Export Reports in Salesforce Lightning

Lightning and Classic users unite!Vote to add the ability to export reports in the new Lightning Experience. February 6, 2016 Ideas,Lightning,Ohana,Salesforce export,reports,vote Read More

Yet Another Amazing Idea: Email Alert to Owner’s Manager

The IdeaExchange is full of amazing ideas. I was creating workflow rules today, and needed to add an Email Alert to inform the owner. As I went about adding the Owner, I thought, “the Owner&#821… August 25, 2015 AwesomeAdmin,Ideas,Ohana,Salesforce annoyed admin,basics,Email Alert,vote,workflow Read More
